    • Method Detail

      • addPost

        public Post addPost(Post post)
        Adds a new post to the database. The date and the creator of the post cannot be null. If the date or creator is null, a null will be returned.
        Specified by:
        addPost in interface PostService
        Parameters:
        post - the post to be added into the database
        Returns:
        the post that was added, or null otherwise

      • getAllPostsPaginated

        public java.util.List<Post> getAllPostsPaginated(int page)
        Returns a list of all the posts within the database.
        Specified by:
        getAllPostsPaginated in interface PostService
        Returns:
        a list containing all the posts

      • getAllPosts

        public java.util.List<Post> getAllPosts()
        Specified by:
        getAllPosts in interface PostService

      • likePost

        public Profile likePost(Profile profile,
                        Post post)
        likePost utilizes the repository's findById method to return a post that is to be liked by a profile. It will check if the post passed through the repository is empty or not, then adds the profile that liked the post to the post's set of likes.
        Specified by:
        likePost in interface PostService
        Parameters:
        profile - that liked the post
        post - that has been liked
        Returns:
        profile that liked the post

      • likeDelete

        public int likeDelete(Profile profile,
                      Post post)
        likeDelete utilizes the repository's findById method to return a post that is to be unliked by a profile. It will check if the post passed through the repository is empty or not, then removes the profile that unliked the post from the post's set of likes.
        Specified by:
        likeDelete in interface PostService
        Parameters:
        profile - that unliked the post
        post - that has been unlike
        Returns:
        1 if post was unliked, -1 if unlike was unsuccessful

      • likeGet

        public int likeGet(Post post)
        likeGet uses the repository's findById method that returns a set of likes the post has. Then it returns the size of the likes set.
        Specified by:
        likeGet in interface PostService
        Parameters:
        post - that has requested its number of likes
        Returns:
        number of likes the post has

      • likeFindByID

        public Profile likeFindByID(Profile profile,
                            Post post)
        likeFindById uses the repository's findById method that returns the post that is being searched through. Then it checks if the profile that is being searched for is in the post's set of likes. If the profile is found then that profile is returned, null if not
        Specified by:
        likeFindByID in interface PostService
        Parameters:
        profile - that is to be searched for in the post's likes
        post - that is to search through
        Returns:
        profile that has been found in the post's likes
